channel.title: OnOptions
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from OnOptions, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: At least 2 killed and 8 injured hurt in shooting at Brown University with suspect still at large
item.description: The suspect was a male who was dressed in black and last seen leaving the building, said Timothy O’Hara, Deputy Chief of Police.

item.title: Big 12 in advanced talks for deal with RedBird-backed fund
item.description: The partnership would offer the 16 member universities a line of credit of roughly $30 million each and is close to being finalized.

item.title: 90 housing markets cross critical inventory threshold—tilting power toward buyers

item.title: How the Best Leaders Rise Above Ego and Lead With Love Instead
item.description: When you operate from fear or greed, you get smaller. When you lead with love, your impact expands.

item.title: U.S., Mexico strike deal to settle Rio Grande water dispute

item.title: This Kobe Bryant Basketball Just Blew Away an All-Time Record at Auction
item.description: It brought in over half a million dollars.

item.title: Microsoft AI boss Suleyman opens up about his peers and calls Elon Musk a ‘bulldozer’ with ‘superhuman capabilities to bend reality to his will’
item.description: "And somehow he sort of mostly manages to pull off what appears to be impossible."

item.title: Danish intelligence report warns of U.S. economic leverage and military threat under Trump
item.description: “China and Russia, together with other like-minded states, are seeking to reduce Western–and particularly US–global influence," the report said.

item.title: 4 Innovative Gift Ideas From the Latest Episode of Shark Tank
item.description: From savory ‘gingerbread’ houses, to fancy stockings, these innovative Shark Tank participants are reimagining holiday gifts.

item.title: Gen-Z Is Anxious About Money. Here’s How an AI Coach Is Cracking the Code
item.description: Gen-Z’s financial stress isn’t a knowledge deficit, but an emotional burden.

item.title: How to See the Geminids Meteor Shower Tonight
item.description: This cosmic phenomenon will put on one heck of a show this weekend, and the moon will cooperate too—so don’t miss it.
